product_name: Mountain Hardwear Sitzmark Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for dynamic outdoor endeavors, the men's Mountain Hardwear Sitzmark Jacket offers stretch panels for mobility and Dry.Q(TM) Elite technology for unsurpassed breathability and waterproofing. Total waterproof protection; body is Dry.Q(TM) Elite 40-denier, 3-layer fabric; stretch panels on back and sides are 20-denier, 3-layer jersey. Dry.Q(TM) Elite starts working the moment you put it on; no waiting for humidity to trigger its breathability. Helmet-compatible hood offers a single-pull adjustment system. Microfleece-lined chin guard eliminates zipper chafing. Cuff tabs and hem drawcords allow quick adjustments to seal out weather. Interior zippered pocket holds keys, ID and other small items. Mountain Hardwear Sitzmark Jacket offers an internal stash pocket, zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for dynamic outdoor endeavors, the men's Mountain Hardwear Sitzmark Jacket offers stretch panels for mobility and Dry.Q(TM) Elite technology for unsurpassed breathability and waterproofing.
